DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluate safety tolerability BMS-986012 patient small cell lung cancer
DOC.brief_title: Study BMS-986012 Subjects With Small Cell Lung Caner
DOC.criteria: For information regard BristolMyers Squibb Clinical Trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Histological cytological confirm small cell lung cancer ( SCLC ) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status 01 least one measurable lesion amenable resection .
